method.name: GET
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the password vault resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: enabled
param.doc: Whether or not the password vault functionality is enabled.

param.name: data_location
param.doc: The storage location for the username password data. Valid values are either gso_lockbox or runtime_db. Only valid if enabled is true.

param.name: public_key
param.doc: An optional public certificate used to generate a JWE from the password. Only valid if enabled is true.

param.name: admin_group
param.doc: The User Registry group used for admin priviledges (read/modify any credential). Only valid if enabled is true.

param.name: resources
param.doc: A list of resources for which username/password information can be stored. Only valid if enabled is true.
